comment._content: James H. Preston (1860-1938), Mayor of Baltimore, President of the National Star Spangled Banner Association of the U. S. A. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_H._Preston

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Another version of this photo is in a book digitized at the Internet Archive: www.archive.org/stream/nationalstarspan02nati#page/n11/mo... (link from wikimedia) It confirms your identification. Thank you! We will update our description.
